bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the month of March as Deep-Vein Thrombosis Awareness Month.
Honors the memory of David Bloom (a National Broadcasting Company journalist who died of a pulmonary embolism).
Recognizes the importance of raising awareness of deep-vein thrombosis.
